ZAKU Task Manager

Unix‑style task manager in C emphasizing I/O and memory‑safe process control.

Reliable Transfer

Python protocol mirroring TCP (ACKs, loss recovery) proven under failure simulations.

Floating‑Point Library

Pure‑C IEEE‑754 arithmetic using bitwise ops, handling overflow, rounding, and special values.
